title: Life and Youth - view of past

content.prompt: Over the course of the poem, in the speakerâ€™s view the significance of the past shifts from

choices.label: a remote memory to an urgent warning
a source of confusion to a reason for gratitude
a cause for shame to an opportunity for introspection
an inadequate consolation to an undesirable constraint

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
